DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare bioavailability 25 mg DKP.TRIS give Enantyum速 oral solution ( Test formulation ) Keral速 tablet ( Reference formulation ) . In addition , study intend evaluate safety tolerability Test Reference formulation .
DOC.brief_title: Comparative Bioavailability Dexketoprofen Trometamol Oral Solution v Tablet Formulations
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct 1 site include 26 successfully screen randomize healthy subject ( 12 female 14 male ) . The study consist : - Screening Visit ( perform within 3 week prior 1st PK study session ) , evaluation study eligibility . - Two pharmacokinetic ( PK ) study session , separate minimum 7 day washout period , include administration one 2 study treatment study session ( namely 25mg DKP.TRIS give Enantyum速 oral solution Keral速 tablet ) accord sequence per randomisation list , blood sample PK assessment plasma pre-defined time 24 hour post-dose . - End Study Visit ( 7-10 day last treatment administration ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject 18 50 year old , Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18 Kg/m2 28 Kg/m2 History previous allergy idiosyncrasy / sensitivity DKP.TRIS NSAIDs ( aspirin , ibuprofen etc ) . Any condition might interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug . Surgery within previous 6 month , blood loss > 400 mL within previous 3 month . Subject positive human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( Hep B ) hepatitis C virus antibody ( Hep C ) result . History clinically significant alcohol , medicine drug abuse .
